verbose_text: Although the exact role of ACLY in tumorigenesis is yet unclear, previous studies have provided several plausible explanations, such as decreased glucose dependent lipid synthesis [XREF_BIBR] or fatty acid or cholesterol starvation [XREF_BIBR], impaired glycolysis [XREF_BIBR], inhibition of histone acetylation [XREF_BIBR], mitochondrial ROS generation [XREF_BIBR], and interception of PI3K / AKT signaling [XREF_BIBR].
